SEARCH
Package pages.functions

Class PageAction

java.lang.Object
pages.functions.PageAction
public class PageAction extends Object
Manages the navigation and visibility of different screens within the application. This class controls the transition between various application pages such as the welcome screen, authentication screens, and functional screens like analytics, customer orders, and inventory.

  • Constructor Details

    • PageAction

      public PageAction() throws IOException
      Constructs a PageAction, initializing all screen instances and adding them to the screen list. Each screen is configured with a reference to this PageAction to manage navigation.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue loading any of the screen resources.

  • Method Details

    • getPageNumber

      public int getPageNumber(JPanel page)
      Retrieves the index of a given JPanel page from the screens list.
      Parameters:
      page - The JPanel page whose index is to be found.
      Returns:
      The index of the specified page, or -1 if not found.

    • showScreen

      public void showScreen(int newPage)
      Changes the visibility of screens to show the selected page and hide others.
      Parameters:
      newPage - The index of the page to be shown.
